<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>82852c24-5561-4261-b993-e405305e23f6#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A hang hatása a fülben</string>
            <string language="en">Sound's effect in the ear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stichhaltiger Effekt im Ohr</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Effet sain dans l'oreille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Efeito sadio na orelha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effetto sano nell'orecchio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδραση ήχου στο αυτί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Efecto sonoro en el oído</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A rezgések terjedése a külső, a közép- és a belső fülben</string>
            <string language="en">Transmission of vibration in the external-, the middle- and the internal ear</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">hang,  hallás,  fül,  </string>
            <string language="en">sound, hearing, ear</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung der Erschütterung im externen -, das
mittlere und interne Ohr</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transmission de vibration dans l'externe -, 
l'oreille moyen- et interne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transmissão da vibração no externo -, a orelha 
média e interna</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasmissione della vibrazione nell'esterno -, 
l'orecchio centrale ed interno</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετάδοση της δόνησης στον εξωτερικό -, η μέση - και το
εσωτερικό αυτί</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transmisión de la vibración en el externo -, el 
oído medio e interno</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ton, Hörfähigkeit, Ohr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bruit, audition, oreille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">som, hearing, orelha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">suono, udienza, orecchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ήχος, ακρόαση, αυτί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sonido, audiencia, oído</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>

          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

    </metadata>
